TopicTitle: Kerbal Minds Corp: Academy for Cadets!

Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome to the Kerbal Minds Corp (KMC)'s Academy for Cadets! Here, members of KMC will offer their help- tips, experiences and also help new young kerbal players to become master engineers and pilots!

We teach everything! We can teach all the following:

Construction Basics 101- Teaching you how to build your crafts to they can be simple, effective and also not need thousands of struts to fly. (Advanced courses also cover how to create larger rockets and also how to achieve more key tasks for specific requirements)

-Rocket construction

-Aircraft construction

Rocket launching and ascent- Teaching you how to launch your rockets into a safe stable orbit and also how to protect your rocket from aerodynamic issues. (Advanced courses will cover entering specific orbits for specific tasks (such as docking and rendezvous) as well as eccentric orbits)

Aircraft Piloting Basics- Teaching you how to fly your aircrafts well, safely and effectively to get to where you need to be and also land safely after your flight. (Advanced courses will cover landing of hypersonic crafts as well as landing faulty/crippled aircrafts)(Cadets can request one-on-one flight training with a KMC member for more in-depth training)

Space Operations Training- Teaching you how to change your orbits effectively, as well as rendezvous and docking. This will also cover how to get to moons and planets effectively. (Advanced courses will help teach rendezvous with inclined stations or celestial bodies as well as docking with complex stations or low altitude objects)

-Landing of spacecraft- We will teach you how to safely land your spacecraft down on various planets and moons and return to orbit (as part of Rocket launching and ascent training) (Advanced courses will manage landing on bodies with atmosphere and returning to orbit with them. Advanced courses will also cover returning to a craft after landing)

Career Management Training- We will teach you how to manage your space center effectively so you can achieve as much as you can and still save your money and explore the Kerbol solar system. (Advanced courses will cover how to manage your space center on harder difficulties)

(We can provide specifically pre-built crafts at cadets request for each course (*Senior Cadets however do not have access to pre-built crafts for advanced courses)

*Only Senior Cadets may take advanced courses (to apply to become a Senior Cadet- simply link a series of screenshots or a persistence file showing that you've landing on the Mun, have a 3 module space station in orbit around Kerbin and have landed on the Mun in (Moderate difficulty or higher) career mode)

We also teach for mods- however you must request help in such a case. If so please tell us what mod(s) you would like help with and what you would like to do with that/those mods.

The KMC: Academy for Cadets hopes we can help you achieve your goals within Kerbal Space Program and beyond!
